divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking across street, bright object seen just as main body passed behindbuilding. Thought it was vert. stab. of military aircraft. No sound. It wasdescending at about 5 - 10 degree angle. Next day, local paper reported mysteryaircraft, about to crash, was reported by hundreds of folks, for many milesalong the Ohio River. No crash was reportedno military base had any aircraft in the area at the time. No one couldidentify exact type of aircraft even tho during WWII many of us were familiarwith common types of military aircraft. I cannot recall exact time of year butthe year was most likely 1943, perhaps 1944.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Owensboro
There were no other sightings in Owensboro on or around November 30th 1942
